products.title: Sevilla Blackout Pistachio Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Add a gentle accent to your decor with this Sevilla Pistachio roller blind, complete with a blackout backing to keep your room darker for longer.     The smokey green tones of this blind make it a great choice for neutral interiors as it adds a subtle contrast that won't overpowe

products.title: Konya Blackout Vine Green
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Vine Green Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Vine Green Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Suede Blackout Citrus Lime Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Suede Blackout Citrus Lime Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £12.12 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our 'Suede Blackout' roller blind range consists of 6 on trend colour options. The fabric has a luxuruious, matt suede finish. The ideal addition to modern homes. Cirtus lime is an on trend green shade. Alomost olive in shade, this fabric will provide a modern twist in cool grey interiors.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2305 Fabric Colour: Citrus Lime Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £13.13 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green double-sided roller blind features a soft wash of calming blue, instantly transporting you to the long, hot days of summer. �With a textured leafy design, it�s ideal for adding a gentle splash colour to a serene room. �The blackout fabric will keep light away when you want to shut the world out and its flame retardant too for extra safety. Isla PVC Blackout Aloe Green is made of moisture resistant fabric, so it's extremely easy to keep it clean.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1977 Fabric Colour: Aloe Green Material: 3 Ply Vinyl, 1 Ply Fibreglass Lining: Pattern Match Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Aqua Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Midas Stripe Blackout Aqua Green Roller Blind in Blue/Green. Made to measure from £20.95 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Midas Stripe Blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Aqua green is a stunning green/ teal shaded blind. Great to introduce colour into your interior styling.
